contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert inches to feet

Input  : 12
Output : 1

#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    int inch;
    printf("Input  : ");
    scanf("%d", &inch);
    printf("Output : %f\n", inch / 12.0);
    return 0;
}

frontMatter.title: Inches to Feet
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to convert inches to feet
